casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alonzo Antonio MURRELL 233PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2016 James W. Carter, Attorney at Law, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Southport, Daniel Lawrence Spiegel, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Murrell, Alonzo Antonio. Oliver G. Wheeler, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of October 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 14th day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
